properties.areaDesc: Wayne, MS; George, MS; Greene, MS
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 5 at 5:14PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a flood warning for the
following rivers in Alabama...Mississippi...

Murder Creek At Brewton affecting Escambia County.
Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Dallas...Monroe and Wilcox
Counties.
Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam - Tailwater affecting Clarke...Monroe and
Wilcox Counties.
Conecuh River At Brewton affecting Covington and Escambia Counties.
Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting George...Greene and Wayne Counties.

.Heavy rainfall is forecast to occur over the next 24 hours. As a result...river
levels are forecast to rise and a flood warning is now in effect. It is
emphasized that the following forecast is based on the expected rainfall during
the next 24 hours. If less rainfall occurs...it may be necessary to revise this
stage forecast downward.

The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Chickasawhay At Leakesville
* From Friday evening until further notice
* At 4 PM Wednesday the stage was...14.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Friday evening and continue to rise near
23.0 feet by Monday early afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter.
* At 22.0 feet...Flooding of lowlands continues and some roads in low lying
areas become cut off by high water.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
